fi.yussiv.minigolf.domain

Interface Obstacle

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Wall

    public interface Obstacle
    Generic obstacle class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAngle(double inboundAngle, Point hitPosition, int margin)
      The angle of the obstacle may differ depending on point of impact, therefore we pass in information about the ball's position and angle.
      boolean overlaps(Point point, int margin)
      Determines if an obstacle overlaps a given point.

    • Method Detail

      • overlaps

        boolean overlaps(Point point,
                 int margin)
        Determines if an obstacle overlaps a given point.
        Parameters:
        point - point to check
        margin - distance from point to include to calculation
        Returns:
        true if point overlaps

      • getAngle

        int getAngle(double inboundAngle,
             Point hitPosition,
             int margin)
        The angle of the obstacle may differ depending on point of impact, therefore we pass in information about the ball's position and angle.
        Parameters:
        inboundAngle - angle in which the ball is moving
        hitPosition - where the collision happens
        margin - distance from hitPosition to include in calculation
        Returns:
        angle of wall at given point
